statistics at cleaning time, alpha=1.1 r=0.8 f=0.2
        n = p.valid_hot + p.valid_cold + p.invalid
        print p.name, 1.0*p.valid_hot/n, 1.0*p.valid_cold/n, 1.0*p.invalid/n
